body: "We are all part of humanity, and thanks to social networking we can be part of events around the world": Globewriter is glued to developments in Egypt, saying, "Right now  we are all Egyptian."
original_body: "We are all part of humanity, and thanks to social networking we can be part of events around the world": Globewriter is glued to developments in Egypt, saying, "Right now we are all Egyptian."
title: Trinidad & Tobago: "We are all Egyptian"
